title: Quick Bright Things
description: Piper Evans lived life in a safe bubble, everything consistent and comfortable. She was a realist, and she believed that excitement was best contained in works of fiction. But she was also a dreamer. Her wild imagination left her was there something missing? In her life, but mostly, within herself? All it takes is the glimpse of possibility from a beautiful stranger to turn everything Piper thought she understood upside down. Now her new consistent lies within this girl. Can she hold onto this new, exciting wrench in her plan, even as quick bright things come to confusion?
author: Lily McCarthy
